REPAIRS

Bringing your drums back to life

If your skin has popped or you just want a new round of fancy rope put on your djembe, look no further than The Drum Hut. We will repair and refinish your djembe in style!

Make yourself a quote by following the guide below and if you're not sure exactly what you're after, don't hesitate to get in touch and we can talk about the options.

Goat Skins

£75

Calf Skins

£90

Deer Skins

£100

Plus Additional Extras

High Quality Rope: £2.50 x number of crown knots
Standard Black Rope: £1.50 x number of crown knots
Smooth skin fold-over: £25
Skin Twist finish: £10
Standard Clean Cut Finish: Free
Wood Refinish: £50
New Rings: £tba
Crack Repair: £15-30 Depending on severity of crack
